resources.string: Sorry, it is not possible to start connection test now.
It seems you have filter for broadcast messages.
Ask before install command executed [rooted devices only]
Prevent WiFi be turned off while device sleeps
License details for open source software
It is needed to have WiFi enabled to use this application.
It is needed to have WiFi enabled to see list of WiFi hotspots.
WLanAdb is Wireless Android Development Bridge that allows to use standard ADB commands without connecting Android device to desktop by USB cable, installing drivers and without need to root it.
Install desktop client from Downloads section of http://wlanadb.com/
Check that desktop client and mobile device belong to one subnetwork.
Launch WLanAdbTerminal devices from command line and check output
If you don\'t see device at the list check that it is connected to sub-network used by desktop
If there is device on list you are ready to use these ADB commands: logcat, push, install
Try WLanAdbTerminal help from command line to find out more details.
PIN: allows to set keyword to protect from unauthorized connection to your mobile device.

Trusted Hostpots: it is a list of trusted hotspots where WLanAdb service will work. All other hotspots will be ignored. This allows you to automatically enable WLanAdb for home and work networks ignoring public hotspots.

Always ask while install: allows control installation process while install command execution. This option available for rooted devices only as far there is ability silently install applications with SU priveleges.
